body: @DrinksandDame I can only hope it stay’s this way

@anonymous_never-watchhentai He went out of his way to check who lives in that apartment so he at least knows that it's Suma Sensei's place (page 8). But he's pretty much in denial phase right now so even if everything seems to point out that it was Karin and Sensei fucking there, he still wants to confirm it for himself. Technically, this is not NTR free anymore since we literally see Kise suffering from seeing the one he loves fucking someone else. But yeah, since the main couple doing fine, I guess we can just look past that and call it ntr free for now.

Damn here we go again.... at the risk of sounding like I'm in denial, and remembering all the author's entanglements in rarefure, I doubt that in the next one there will be blackmail or rape against Karin, I think Kise will ask the teacher to end the relationship (taking advantage of the fact that he is mentally weaker than Karin) to take the opportunity and start dating Karin, this way would enter the plot of the ex-girlfriend, which obviously must be the other teacher who goes around with the mouth cover, or the drama of "Tom Cruise" who obviously must be in love with the teacher or Karin (see chapter 9 page 13)....The thing I still don't understand is the subplot of the art club couple, are they just exhibitionists, are they trying to tempt the teacher to extort him later, or do they just want to get him into their perverse game? there is too much secrecy between them and the girl seems to have seen something going on in Karin and her friends' group (Page 12, chapter 11)
